lines.text: Yeah, like in 300. Which was a great puppet show I saw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh Grog, I heard that, where they used 300 puppets!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if all but a couple of us snuck into one of these buildings and waited and a couple of us made a stink and got a significant number of them to chase across the bridge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But then how could we cut the bridge behind? We have a flying carpet so we can go back and forth, but we could drop a significant number of them down into the lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we have Tiberius standing there to just Firebolt it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait a minute. We want to bait them, is that what we're trying to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we want to drop the bridge and have them fall to their deaths.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, what if you let off a stink bomb in the middle of the camp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of them would try to leave across the bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well remember, there's a tunnel on the other side of camp. They could run that way as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also a huge, and your stink-cloud is only, you know, 20 or 30 feet across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bridge, now that you've traversed it, it's ten feet wide, and runs about a little over 200 feet or 250 feet in length.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can get a lot of them on that bridge and then cut it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Makes their numbers count for nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I've heard that one. That puppet show.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think I might have a solution.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think it's about time I used these.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We could both burn it, we could hack and burn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of creatures can you make?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, that's all up to the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's up to the deck, or it's up to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, what if it's a scary thing that scares them away?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Either way, it works in our favor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I test something real quick? If I pull out the magic carpet or I take it back from whoever the fuck had it, and I stand on it, does it hold me up or do I sink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get on top of the carpet and you will it to begin to shift, and the carpet around you lifts, but you are anchoring it to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So this is a big problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you've got Feather Fall. You've got Feather Fall! Is that still a thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, which just slows my fall. It doesn't take me across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That might not be a thing anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Levitate or something-- but we could tie a rope to you and it can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- it makes you really light, and we can just drag you behind us. Yeah, it'll work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we need to float Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In case we destroy the bridge.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, don't worry about that, Grog. I'll just cast Fly on you, because I can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you can Fly Trinket, too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, hang on, hang on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, let's have a failsafe in case a few get across the bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of us creating a diversion and running away, or these mystical, magical--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- weird dragon creatures. What if they scare them the other way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have to be pretty scary. And then, hey, that works.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I just said, the path would be clear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, are we scaring them or are we luring them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's all up to the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're luring them. And also, might I remind you all, that they're being mind controlled by this, what, illithid--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should try to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if the illithid recognizes that your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- your things are false, then he's not going to send his men--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or he may send them to kill whoever is creating the illusion.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Either way, they're coming for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we could create a distraction and bring them away from the tunnel's entrance and we can just sneak around them. No?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean, did you see a way to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a bear. Are you crazy? (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he's trying to kill us. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay on this side of the bridge, who wants to go be a distraction? Who wants to be the bait? Who's real fast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we doing his bait or are we doing a real bait?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if you cast something big and they turn it against us? That could suck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fake. It's just a hologram.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's an illusion that I control.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we throw one of those and send--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of us, one of the cards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody be Gambit and throw that bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We really just need someone to keep them from running through that tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need some way to keep them from coming-- going--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you send a card that looks like a dragon on the other side, in the tunnel, and then they run towards us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's wrong with them running away from us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually have a spell, while I was reading through my book last night, catching up on spells that I kinda forgot about. I learned something called Hallucinatory Terrain, where I can make the entire terrain look like whatever I want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can make the chasm look like it's solid ground!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make the chasm look like it's solid ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make the chasm look like it's solid ground--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make the tunnel across the way look like it's caved in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a great idea, but let's--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll throw the illusion on the fake lands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- let's stack the deck, all right? I'm still gonna be live bait, because I have an inkling that that thing, whatever it is, with the tentacles on its face--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'll take the flying carpet and tie it around my back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You better run fast and not get taken!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you good with hauling ass?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. As long as you can haul ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I take the rug from Grog--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna roll it up and I tie it, I have a rope to tie it to my back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a big rug on your back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Might I interject? I'm so sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys-- You and you will be hauling ass away from the charging horde--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm staying on our side of the bridge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's got a rug, he's got the flying carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we're gonna make them hallucinate--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, when you get all the way to the other side of the bridge, then we're gonna chop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're gonna chop it when they start coming across the bridge. We're hoping that they're gonna just fall off the edge instead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which side are we gonna chop it on? Our side or their side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once he gets back to our side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) They come back, everybody falls in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the bridge made of? Is it just rope and wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what it looks like, it is rope and stone platforms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like slats, slats of stone, that then the rope is tied around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very, very thick, hefty twine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. So Tiberius and Vax are going over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before Vax leaves, I just put my hands on his shoulders, and I cast Enhance Ability on him, and give you a dexterity boost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm also going to sing a little song--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you have advantage on all dex rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what's the boost? How high is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On all dex rolls. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's great, because that's how I attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, advantage on dex ability checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like acrobatics, things like that, sleight of hand, stealth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, I'll sing an inspiration song for both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, inspiration dice to Vax, and who else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax and who else? Gets inspiration dice? Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, these two-- Grog and Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So both of you guys have a d8 of inspiration dice you can spend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, Grog isn't going, Tiberius is going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. Tiberius and Vax, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could have gave it to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, Tiberius, walk on a bit behind me, and I'm gonna walk up to the edge of town, and I'm gonna chat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. What if you-- What!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, before this happens, where's everyone placed? You guys--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are across the bridge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna set up on our side of the bridge, I'm gonna set up the Bad News gun and get ready to train it on whatever might try and come across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any big rock formations that I can sort of use as a shelter and kind of stay behind that but also peek around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 20 feet off from the edge, on the goblin side, there is one outcropping of, like, a large stalagmite that you could probably get behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the goblin side. Oh, do you wanna be on their side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be on our side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your side, meaning the side that the war camp is on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I thought we were all on the other side of the bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're gonna stay on the side that doesn't have all the bad guys on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. There's the goblin side, which is where you guys first went through, there's the bridge, and then there's the war camp side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you're on-- Goblin side for you, Goblin side for Grog--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goblin side for Percy, setting up the Bad News, your crazy gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're on the war camp side

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, and I'm gonna run that, but you guys are all going back to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The safer side. The further side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna be-- Can I be like halfway in between on the bridge? Is that a bad idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that. It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it! You can fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can turn into a bird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! You can turn into a bird!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does your spell cast? I mean, your spell last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a concentration thing. So, as long as I can keep it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, maybe you should do that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, for up to 30-- 24 hours, actually. It's not a concentration spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, how far does it reach?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- work around the edge of the bridge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- smells, like some other sort of natural terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what are you going to make the terrain look like? What is your alteration?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, what I'm doing, whenever we-- can I make it look like there's a cave-in happening through the tunnel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Wait! No! Make it look like it's really far--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, what if you fudged it so the cliff--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's what I'm gonna do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- looked like it went 30 feet further out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What I'm gonna do, I just want the terrain to look, on my side--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close to what they're used to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want the terrain to look exactly like what it is, but I just wanna stretch it out a little bit, so it looks like they've got, like, an extra running space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so if it looks too different--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So like an additional 40 or so feet out from the actual--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Of actual, yes. Like the bridge is an extra 40 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The actual ceiling is maybe about 120 feet up, so it might be a little hard to do that, and cause a cave-in-type illusion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'll do that. Then I'm gonna just-- you know what, I'm gonna stay on the opposite side of the bridge, and I'm gonna focus on making that illusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool. So you go ahead and you cast Hallucinatory Terrain--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see an additional 40 feet of the cliff stretching out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can actually see that the bridge looks attached to it, it's a very, very convincing illusion. And you kind of have to remind yourself that it's an illusion, just so you don't fall for it either!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, be careful guys, please be careful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you're kind of chilling in the middle of the bridge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The rest of you are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm on the outside of the bridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- on the other side-- outside of the bridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're off the bridge now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So now, Tiberius, Vax, you guys walk across the bridge, keeping grip both side rails, feeling it rock to and fro from the continuous warm bellowing of wind up from the cavern beneath you. Eventually you bring your way across. What looks like you should be stepping on terrain is still the bridge, and it takes you a minute to adjust to the fact that you're still going across the bridge, but it looks like rocky terrain. Eventually you make it to the other side and you grab purchase on stone. Looking ahead of you, you can see about 60 feet ahead of you the outskirts of the war camp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, you wait here, ready to run. I take Tiberius by the arm like this. Vox Machina.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So I stealthily walk up to the closing distance to the edge of town and I stand there. I click my boots of haste together.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he runs off I cast Greater Invisibility on myself.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly on myself and I hover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of those are concentration spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only have one of those up at any given point in time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're now floating up. Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm at enough edge to where her illusions are, as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But over the bridge just in case I fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. So you're now just kinda hovering above the bridge now. You--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the sudden surge of magical energy through your body like adrenaline just pumping into your system.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he does that I toss out three cards.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right at the rim of where the illusion stops.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No matter how far or how long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should call this a rim job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. This will be very, very interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you convincing yourself or are you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on the safe side with Bad News and me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm with you guys. We're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So currently one of the cards bursts and you can see rising up from its energy this awful-looking humanoid skeletal undead creature with long golden red robes, with this gnarled gold crown and these glowing blue eyes and just pure arcane energy across this horribly gnarled skeletal face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There stands this hideous-looking lich cackling to itself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, can we hit it and quit it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one (poof) and you see before you a kind of --

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Flip them over, they have good graphics on the cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third card. From the smoke appears a red-skinned dragonborn with long blue robes and a staff with a glowing beam of light on it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. It must be a joker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cards are now spent, correct?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Uh, no, they exist until I dispel them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but I mean the actual cards don't go back in the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you shout out, the card illusion appears. You see about five or six duergar kind of look out from a nearby tent and go-- and then start running toward the center of the town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 20 seconds pass. And then you start hearing this (boom boom boom boom). It sounds like a drum beat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cut the rope, cut the rope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet, not yet, not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you now see about 16 duergar come running out from the center of town, armored, weapons drawn, a few with crossbows, two trolls and an ogre charging out. You see the ogres holding this giant-- it looks like a stone slab for one of its clubs, and the two trolls just come with their claws open, rushing right towards you and the illusions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I flip the double birds and start walking backwards a little bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I command the soldier to start swinging his sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're stepping back, four of the duergar immediately take, using their inertia, pull and release javelins in your direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take two javelins--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna use Uncanny Dodge. For anything I can see, I can dodge for half damage, if I need to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, good to know. The first one strikes you in the torso for a total of 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other hits you for a total of eight damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so, it was 11 and eight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, I knew this was coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can immediately see one of the trolls goes and just lunges forward and slashes the lich, just passing through its form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It went through, it kinda loses its footing for a second, stops and kinda looks angry, turns and starts slashing at it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, isn't he on the fake ground? The lich?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, yeah, he's like right at the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the troll kind of steps forward--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They're right at the edge, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and the troll turns around and starts slashing. The other one goes right for the veteran. And (laughs) goes running right off the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ogre goes running forward, right towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just their speed, they're just the first ones to get there. Duergar have tiny legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched voice) Where's the roll for initiative, man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're already back, you're at the bridge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is what I'm saying, what are you doing? This is your reactionary part. We're just taking-- this isn't a battle, this is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm backing it up, I'm running, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go charging back onto the bridge. As you go running, all right, both trolls and the ogre have just gone off the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear them screaming as they tumble into the darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't occur to me that there is a bridge--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four duergar also go spilling over the side, screaming as they tumble into the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of them stop, kind of look around and--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I start-- as that's happening, I start to pull back and float away and I'm commanding all of my guys to come through the bridge. Because I can command them within 30 feet. So they're now, they're all within 30 feet of me, retreating as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As this is happening, you can now see some of the members of the duergar that are now at the edge are some of the elite guard, with the blackened armor you saw. They both kinda step forward and put their foot out, feeling for purchase, give a nod, pull out their swords, and start hacking at the bridge immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm taking a shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we-- does our aim reach? Our ranged attacks, do they reach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this distance, it's gonna be a serious penalty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking that shot, because I can shoot forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of god and all that is holy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can at least try, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll. As you-- You're at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your arrow (shooting sound) off, you (gun misfiring sound) and there's a slight delay, and you wonder, why isn't it working? And this horrible explosion sound bursts out as you can now see, black and red smoke pouring out of the front of the barrel of Bad News, and it burns your hands for a second and you're like, ah, shit, take a second to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, so I gotta stop and clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, however, because you are unable to halt that, both of those duergar take shots at the bridge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you on the carpet, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, I said I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're running and pulling the carpet out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and begins to fall out from under you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is gonna go ahead and be a dex check now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, good, because the first roll was a one. The second roll was a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus! Plus, plus, plus nine is 28.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! You almost died!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You pull out the carpet. As you're going to set it down, as you feel the bridge beginning to like, give out from under you, you feel this creepy sensation pushing towards the back of your head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clean your gun, clean your gun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a willpower saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am, I'm ready, it's too far!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I survive a free fall and you hit me with that right after? Yeah, will save?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's-- what is it, I've never done that? That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at the top of your sheet of your stats, above your stats, on the right of your stats. Oh, it's your wisdom saving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are running, you get the carpet out, you leap onto it and your whole sense and awareness of your surroundings just fades from you. You just feel your entire body going numb for a second and you just feel yourself falling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fly down! Get him! Get him!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Oh bother! Shoo! I go get him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29 dex save right down the toilet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and swoop down, fly. You manage to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is just staring up at this moment.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Very good. I go just to touch him, I am not trying to pull him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Try to grab him! Try to grab him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Fly on him? All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is still just kind of standing there, not doing anything. As you finish casting the Fly spell, your Fly spell dissipates because it's a concentration spell and you can have one at a given time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what I am.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I ask right now, is he--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He is, okay. Then I don't do that, because you can't fly yourself, so I do grab him, this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you grab him as his whole weight goes onto you. What's your strength?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has been nice knowing you, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see this all happening off to the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? You rush down, diving, you grab the back of his armor. As you yank up on him, you manage to just pull him across and get him to the other edge. The flying carpet, however, has plummeted down in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You lost our flying carpet, you unconscious bastard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Tiberius swoops up. You guys just see them both plummet into darkness and then flying up at the edge of the crevasse on your side, Tiberius clutching your brother, currently just staring off into space and dropping him down with a dull sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bridge slaps onto the side of the cavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I run over to Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm like trying to figure out what's wrong with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just disappeared into the darkness below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was our ticket across the chasm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I loved that carpet, damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a minute passes or so, you come back to your senses.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I slap him with Mage Hand. Snap out of it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are still across there, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see across the way that there are a bunch of them just standing at the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanna take a shot at the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can see them and they control you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shoot it in the eye, man.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not from that distance, I don't think. His sniper rifle goes far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll the damage. Across the way you can hear the resounding (gunshot).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, yeah! That don't suck! 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just a carnival game for Percy at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time you can now see the duergar looking up and backing away from the cliff side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come to the bridge, which is just dangling off the side now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're on the goblin side, now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the goblin side and the bridge is just dangling down into darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wants to have a picnic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So how many (monster sounds) are over there ?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how many duergar left? How many--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, how many are left after all that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After all that, you saw a few more kind of filter out from the town, you have probably about 25 visible at that moment that have all backed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hang on him visually and I'm gonna wait to take another shot until he tries to stand up again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if he tries to stand up again, I want to shoot him again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait, you can shoot him while he's on the ground! Can't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so much more fun to wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can shoot him, but it's at disadvantage to shoot someone who's prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, he's got cover. And it's funnier to just wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes and he kind of drifts back up. Take another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you (gunshot), fires off, you can now see it drift away--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and all the rest of the duergar are now retreating into the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What're you gonna do? All of our shit's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. What're we gonna do? Leave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can-- can we walk up and see--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- if we can find another bridge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to. Okay. So you walk over to the edge, and you kind of look across to the sides. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and looking down, you can see the bridge is just kind of like drifting from the air that's flowing, and you can just see the-- and it's not like the whole bottom floor is all lava, there's just streaks of it pouring down from whatever the interior of this lower chasm is. You see, at the edge of the rope break, which goes down for a good 150, 200 feet or so, dangling, and there's a tiny little flicker of material--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- wrapped up in the ropes of the rope bridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the carpet! It seems to be the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. We have an infinite rope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have infinite rope! I'm gonna tie it to myself--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it still-- it's just at the end of the-- all the way down there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, watch out for that warm air, whatever that was.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh. You're right. I take out an empty bottle while I do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently just kind of rippling and shifting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be some sort of water surface below you. About 150 feet down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run and jump off the cliff!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- pouring, like from the ceiling and portions of the wall--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, and I jumped all the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- but it's all just kind of pouring down and pooling at the edges and then cooling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have great form in mid-air.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And you don't know this yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can see the waterfall, it's cascading over the side--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're being incredibly childish. Don't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- is currently rushing past you at about 30 feet to your right, and it seems to be splashing into this pool below.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Waterfall. Ah! I retrieve the magic carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab the magic carpet, you roll it up, make your way back up to the surface.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ah, here you are. By the way, cool stuff down there. It's actually not lava, it's water! Aha. Believe it or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Water? How far down from the bridge?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's about 150 feet from the bridge, but it's about 1000 feet down all the way. We could traverse down, somehow, and I think it would be a nice place to go explore.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Especially because we have nothing else to do, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we could go to the camp and go kick some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, look, we know-- we can't get over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we have a carpet now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we go over one at a time and then we're waiting for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, fly me down with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The three of us can fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius and I are going to fly down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, we know that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- deeper down is where they've gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So probably it'd be best to go down. We could have avoided all of this bullshit if we'd just have known--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we didn't know, and if there's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't wanna fight, I don't wanna fight that guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- if there's more than one of them these, though, he's gone boodle-oodle-ooo to his friends right now, I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- if we can it'd be good to put this guy in the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Okay, take me down--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, let me, let's go see, let's go see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- back, past that village, that they're protecting.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I'm still flying, you can take-- Percy, would you like to come?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've-- to ride the carpet down to the bottom with Percy and Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I-- whoever's going down should be on the carpet, 'cause I can still fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and Percy are on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the two of you get on the carpet, you drift down, and you begin to make your way down this giant crevasse. As you get down, the air gets warmer and warmer, and you begin to see as you come down, a good 600 feet now at this point, into this much larger space than the one you guys are currently above. It's like a giant, triangular, open cavern down here. It kind of funnels up into where the bridge was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any tunnels, or areas that look like it leads someplace of interest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one big lava pool that is spilling, and then kind of giving a little bit of light to the inside of a tunnel that continues further down at a decline. The opposite side--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lava tunnels? What, are you crazy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the opposite side, you can see there's a small outcropping and a smaller waterfall that is pouring out of the side of the mountain, like another sea is now meeting the river underneath, and that is just kind of cascading out from the side of the rock, dropping about 30 or 40 feet, and hitting the edge of the rock pool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On Cthulhu's side, you're talking about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, Tiberius, give me some light?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I take-- and I cast Control Water, and I just take the pool-- the water in the bottom of the pool, and I bend it, and I part the pool, and I take it and I cascade it all the way up, following the lava flows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can part seas with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you can part elements of it, but like, it is a large, large, large body of water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay, okay. Well I'm taking-- okay. I don't necessarily part it, but I take the water, and I draw it up, cascading along the edges following all the lava streams going into the tunnels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, another thing you notice, is there are two trolls and an ogre currently trying to stay afloat, as one of them just (sucking sound) gets pulled under the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin moving the water to the sides and you begin to cool some of the lava flows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the glowing red magma begin to cool to a dark black and become solid. As it does you can see parts of it crack, as the magma's still pushing out. But you're definitely staunching the flow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna kind of push it, you said there was a tunnel kind of going up into Cthulhu side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is a tunnel that seemed-- the opening leads to the back, and there's a waterfall that is pouring out from that side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lava flow is going down the opposite direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there's like a tunnel kind of carving out that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Like a large opening that continues further down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I take all of the water, and I really just concentrate, and I gather just a big tube, and I push it down that tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the best-- the water that you gather from this, you force into a quick geyser in that direction. As it sprays across the front, you can see it begins to cool some of the magma. It's a pretty hefty flow, you manage to slow it, and you do cool parts of it, but it's gonna be difficult and take you a while, if you're just constantly pushing water on it, to give the flow any sort of serious stop. You notice the lava flow doesn't coat the entire floor of the tunnel, just a side of it. It's almost like there's some portion of it that is walkable, adjacent to the lava.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We can also go in the not-lava cave, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, that lava cave just looks important.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know. Because of the lava.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's go tell the others what we've found, and then we'll come back and decide which way to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes a lava cave is just a lava cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other troll. (sucking sound) Pulled beneath the surface.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so, I don't wanna go down there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, it looks like there's something eating those trolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- there's things pulling trolls. Yeah, let's not go down there where there's things eating trolls! Why don't we just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. In the giant water pool in the bottom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but we're gonna have to go down eventually, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we have to go down there, there's nothing that we need down there!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But across the way is a 25-man battle with a huge, nasty boss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's seven of us and one of us is Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, everybody keeps saying that everything is deeper and deeper, so I think we're gonna have to go--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Vex on this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All those assholes are still standing on the edge across there. Do we have-- we've flown out of a falling tower before, we were all able to do it, can we just fly up and over those shitheads and go towards the tunnel?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not with the eye of that mind flayer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, look what it did to you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't we go 150 feet in the air, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The tunnel doesn't go that high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you were at least 150 feet across that bridge when he did that to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It can grab us from there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was on the bridge when that happened--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were on the bridge when that happened, you were--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- and fell down. I wasn't way above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the bridge was like 250 feet across, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You were about, loosely, 80 feet across when it got you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So its range is probably like 100 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you said it's 150-ish feet in here, though, to the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the ceiling it's about 150 feet, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have ranged weapons as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) I think we should go down!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can drop me like a depth charge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's no sign of anything intelligent down there, other than something that's eating trolls underwater. It could be just giant whales down there! We have no idea! There's no sign of humans at all! It's lava and death animals!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, okay. If I go down there--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There's more like tunnels, that go further--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and look in one of the tunnels--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- can I look in one of the tunnels and see if I find tracks? If I do, can we go that way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How're you gonna go in the tunnels?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's tunnels that don't have lava flowing into them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I can control water for at least an hour.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There's, so, down there, there's a big pool of water--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- a tunnel going towards the mind flayer side, with no lava--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- and then there's another cave with lava--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is a tunnel that we can walk in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- that we can go, going away from him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see if there's anything resembling tracks--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with Vex that-a-way. I can cool lava as we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not that kind of a tunnel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is, on-- Okay. In a giant cavern, there is, towards the side where you guys kind of entered, underneath where you first came in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- there is a descending, large tunnel, of which there are a series of lava flows that kind of pool into one river of lava that covers half of that path down--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the direction of goblin town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cavern ends and there is a waterfall pouring out of the side of the wall--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- that just kind of flows down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so there's a cavern opening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. There is a-- there-- well, there is essentially a hole where water is pouring out of.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we can go in the one with lava.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's water pouring out of it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make that stop happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what would we find in a tunnel with water pouring out of it? It's not like anything lives up there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just-- I would much rather face random beasts who are just random beasts, than mind flayers who can suck my brain out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There would be no random beasts, though, it's just nothing but plumbing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but Kima did not fall prey to random beasts, she fell prey to these shits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, fine! Let's do whatever you guys want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think-- I don't think a boss battle-- I don't think we can fight this guy and win!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vote. Vote. For fuck's sake, vote. Put it to a vote.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. All in favor of going to the duergar village and facing the giant fucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up and over, up and over!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That direction. That's four of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All in favor of going into the lava flows, to find something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A Draconian-- you come from a political family!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I don't vote. I don't believe in our system. Anyway, that's none of your business.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't know what that means!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now. Tiberius can fly, Keyleth is an eagle who can carry a gnome, and maybe my sister?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that leaves Percy and Grog and I on the flying carpet. Can it hold our weight? Let's give it a little test?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, if this doesn't work, we're going to the tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flying carpet can't carry Grog on his own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, then I can't carry Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can, on the other hand, use--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't-- wait, wait, wait. Why can't, why can't Vex and I just, at least, go check it out before we do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You lost the vote, Keyleth. You lost the vote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, So, what, you ladies hop on the flying carpet? LAURA & MARISHA: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So, as you guys are discussing this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're stealing our flying carpet? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two ladies have leaped on the flying carpet--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're just checking it out! We're coming back! We're coming back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Throw a red one! Throw a red one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just wait ten god damn minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They shout, as they disappear, into the darkness below the cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The mind flayer isn't on pause!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I could, I have, wait! I have a--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was gonna go right in my mouth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Cause I have a dungeoneering kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you pull out your lantern, as the two of you are going down towards the water--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- the rest of you kind of stand at the edge of the crevasse going, 'Uh...'

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take the river flow, where the water's flow is coming out of this waterfall--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile the mind flayer's saying, (gravelly voice) 'I haven't got all day.'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you guys float down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- the two trolls that were missing-- the ogre is not anywhere to be seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- there's just a slight ripple in the water's surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't wanna land, we just wanna go towards the tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. As you staunch the water supply of this waterfall, it just kind of holds it in place, with enough of a force that the water coming out is being balanced by the force you're putting back on it, it's just kind of holding it there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you lower the water, so we can fly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as the water vanishes, beneath where the waterfall was, you can see an actual small tunnel that's carved into the rock--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't do anything yet! We don't know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm agreeing with Scanlan, and I am mooning off the cliff's face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm stealthing, let's stealth? Let's be very quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you turn into an animal?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I fly back up to tell them what's going on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I can! I go into a black panther form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, remember when we had women in this party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both of you guys roll stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Panthers have, like, advantage on stealth, something like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have advantage on stealth check. Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You guys are just in further then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- the dex of the panther is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's whatever the dex-- it's gonna be like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's gonna be like 20 or something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys move-- are you staying on the carpet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're like hopping down off the carpet, and I just want to look around for tracks!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- and then I bring it up, while I tell them all that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go back down--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yes, because they need it to get down here as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're going-- okay, you guys are joining us. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just looking for tracks right now, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah and I followed you, saw what was going on, took your carpet, and I'm giving it back to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't take our carpet, we're on the carpet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I thought you guys hopped off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys stepped off the carpet, she said, and you transformed, began stealthing in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right. We did transform. Okay, sure, you can take the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing that you turn around and see Tiberius had rolled the carpet and is currently taking it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, go ahead and roll-- this would be survival for tracking? Just to get an idea for anything around you see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see some scratches into the mud of the surface there that lead into a tunnel. You see drag marks, you see footprints, and that's the best you can make out at this in this point in time. But the footprints appear to be dwarven, or dwarf-sized in nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to see what the scratch marks look like? If they look like any type of beast I might recognize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scratch marks are across the ground, it looks just like fingers being pulled through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any type of residue, any type of slime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No that you can tell, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see where the tunnel leads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, there's no light source in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the light, remember, when I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a little alcove. You see within the tunnel a series of skeletons or bodies that are partially decomposed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see what looks like a pile of rags in the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can either run or loot. What should we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, go check it out, ladies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm so scared, but okay, here's the thing, I remember another situation very similar to this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it was the lair of one of those umber hulks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Why don't we just go back maybe to the entrance of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex'ahlia, what is going on down there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh brother, I think we found the lair of the umber hulk

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very-- well, the actual tunnel is maybe about five to eight feet across and it would not be able to fit an umber hulk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? Can I go along the walls very stealthily and see if I can find any opening, anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step inside and put your hands across the walls--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unconscious, asleep, or dead. Not moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is she-- what do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell from here. It's just like kind of curled over in the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to roll a save against smugness really quickly. Can I save against smugness? I feel a wave of smugness in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you might. You're not saved against smugness, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, I think you should turn into an eagle. Can she turn into something big enough that can carry me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can. Yeah. A giant eagle, I believe you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are having this conversation, 'cause you're talking to each other--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. We were talking really quietly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smooth head, purplish and blue in color, a series of tentacles in its mouth. A giant scar drawn across one of its eyes, and it looks filthy, and it looks desperate. And just looks at the two of you and you hear a sudden voice in your minds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No movement, just conversation, saying, "What, who are you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop to my knees and I look at him and just say, it's okay, we're friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts up a hand like this and you see there's a flicker of arcane energy and a barrier appears between you and this creature. And just looks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my Druidcraft and I just make a little flower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's a pretty little tulip and I lay it at the edge of the barrier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not a very charismatic person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It holds its place, and the voice again hits your mind and says, "How did you find me? What is your purpose here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't mean to disturb you, great sire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will die if you try anything."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will not fall here, I will not die here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We mean to help you! We mean to find our way out, and find our friend. That's all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't want to die either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please. Who did this to you? We can help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it just, "Leave me in peace, then, or give me a reason not to slay you where you stand."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can help you get revenge against your brethren who did this to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a slight change in mood, you just feel. "Revenge?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll the shit out of that new dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The barrier flickers and dissipates. It reaches over and grabs what looks like a gnarled stick. Pulls itself up onto its legs, now what looked like a small minuscule creature is now, even in his terrible hunched form, is standing extremely tall, like scraping the top of this maybe eight-foot-tall ceiling in this tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a step forward and says, "Revenge? You speak of revenge. This is a language I wish to know very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we bring it with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like to come with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Meet our friends? We have friends.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll be right there, I was trying to get the rest of the party here, but everyone's being buttholes. I fly back down with the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come down with the carpet. At the edge of this opening, you see Keyleth, you see Vex, both emerge with a horrible tentacle-faced gnarled being with a staff coming out with them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, did you make a friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks about to you, then looks at Tiberius and says, ignoring your question, "You have persuasion to the arcane."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I'm a sorcerer! I do all kinds of fun things with the arcane!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we call you Clarence for short?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, join us on the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can he fit on the carpet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The rest of our allies are up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He carefully steps on the carpet, once again like its tentacles are (slithering noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving around, its mouth and its eyes are constantly darting, it looks extremely nervous and almost like a cornered animal that's just barely being coaxed onto this journey. You see with each step it takes there a slight flicker of arcane energy at the tip of its fingers, like it's just prepared for anything to go terribly wrong. It steps onto the carpet and goes, "Take me to your allies."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ah yes, we have wonderful allies!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can even maybe call them friends, even?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It crosses its legs and sits on the carpet, holding its staff to its chest on the far corner staring at all of you and says, "Go. Now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is the thing I saw in the village!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that? Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, it's leapt off at this point, hovering about and you can see this crackle of fire in its hand and it goes, (panicked noises)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm standing between them, like, it's okay! These are the allies we speak of!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Don't use a whip, Scanlan, sing a friendly song as he is our friend-- ally. To the guy. Ally. He is-- He's in a little spot of trouble and we are going to help him get revenge, or something of the sort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It kind of hobbles forward with its gnarled staff, and says, "I was cast out from my hive. I "was cursed with the mark of the arcane. My people see that as an ill omen. I was discarded, left to die."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, the hive is sick. The mind that keeps us safe is no longer its own."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One, an alien one, has come and taken the mind hostage, it has taken my people as its own "playthings. I was able to escape its mental grasp." It reaches up and taps the metal on its head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the guy we've needed this whole time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My people will not so easily escape its grasp, "they are now under the control of this creature."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we find this creature, we might be able to free your hive as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be why I wish to have your alliance."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Help me free our hivemind, free my people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, can we sense motive on him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should also have him help us in your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would put this in a group sense motive right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled-- what do we add to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sense motive in this would be your insight, sorry. Pathfinder to Fifth Edition!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through your intense grasping this creature's disposition, best you can, as alien and unfamiliar as its mannerisms and speech and interests may be, you get the feeling that it's speaking out of desperation and it's speaking out of genuine interest. You've piqued it with the hint of revenge, you've piqued it with the idea of alliance as opposed to being alone. You get the feeling that it speaks the truth. It genuinely is asking for your help in freeing its people from whatever is influencing their current actions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we just call him Clarence? (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clara. It could be a she.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are very interested in being allies with you. Might we have your word that upon defeating this creature, we will be safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And as a symbol of our dedication to you, I'd love to play you just a little bit of a song that might heal some of those wounds and scrapes that you seem to have all over your body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you the dirtiest look you've ever received.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) It was because of the arcane!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a sudden step forward towards you, his tentacles-- (slithering noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) When I get that feeling, I want Clarota healing. Clarota healing is something that's good for you. Ooh ooh ooh. (sings embellished melisma)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota's dancing, I can see it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check-- no, a performance check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It then kind of-- its tentacles withdraw in such a way that gets you kind of off-put and the song comes to a halt. "I'd not heard a song. I shall call upon you for more in the future."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's many more where that came from!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now we talk about how we can kill K'varn."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That went very interestingly! We'll pick up from that point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry we had to rebel, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah sorry about that, you guys. Sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry! It was for a good cause!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you for rebelling, and staking out on your own!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've acquired for the moment a very curious ally. Yeah, this will be an interesting branching point for next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get some damn hats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! We should get him to make us hats!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We definitely need one for Grog. We have to get him to make us hats for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I hope you guys enjoyed that! No combat. You guys avoided quite a few possibilities for battle and that makes for an interesting dynamic. So well done! You've killed a crap ton of duergar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a couple trolls and an ogre, by sending them off a cliff! It was a pretty eventful evening!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, so guys, thank you so much for watching! Also, as a reminder, there is Dwarven Forge that's been doing an amazing kickstarter for its next set. I was a supporter for all of Dwarven Forge's kickstarters and I'm looking forward to being able to break out some of those dungeon tiles in this game in the near future. But if you haven't checked it out yet, I recommend it! Go and see if you can back it. Those guys are awesome, the quality of their work is great! All of you DMs out there that wanna run some seriously legit dungeon setups for your miniatures and battle circumstances, it's highly recommended. So go check that out. I know I've already backed it, so come join me! And (evil voice) one of us, one of us! Anyway, does anyone else have something they wanna talk about for the evening, guys?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thanks for tuning in, guys. I wanted to bring up International Tabletop Day.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's coming up on April 11th. We're going to be live-streaming Tabletop Day from here in this studio. Probably not as complicated a setup as this, but similar of a set up. For those of you that have not registered yet for International Tabletop Day, go to the website tabletopday.com or org, I could be saying it wrong, the chat room will let you know.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Get in on it. It's going to be a lot of fun!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So I think that's pretty much it, thanks so much guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no worries, I think next week we're gonna try and do a Q&A after the game. So we'll stay for an hour or more after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Subs only! You get to hang out.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Subs only, so if you want to ask questions next week after the show, make sure you subscribe.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Do it. Yeah, that's pretty much it, man.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Tune in tomorrow for So You Don't Have To, where Becca and Hector play the worst games they can find so you don't have to. And then Gather your Party, where we play board games with our friends, and it's gonna be a lot of fun.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All right, I'm gonna-- you guys can talk amongst yourselves, I gotta run. I'm the only person here so I'm gonna run back, turn off the stream. Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) This guy, this guy. Guys, thanks again, have a wonderful night, we'll see you soon.
